actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of the title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover certain additional inpatient hospital services furnished outside the United States to individuals insured for benefits provided under such part A.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for inpatient hospital services furnished outside the United States to individuals insured for benefits under the supplementary medical insurance program.

titles.title: A bill to amend part A of the title XVIII of the Social Security Act to cover certain additional inpatient hospital services furnished outside the United States to individuals insured for benefits provided under such part A.
